drawPost

public void drawPost(boolean isDeformed,
                     int option,
                     int[] comp,
                     int step)
Draws structure for post-visualizer.

Parameters:
isDeformed - Parameter for drawing deformed or undeformed shape.
option - The result option for drawing results.
comp - The component of demanded result to be visualized.
step - The step number for drawing deformed shape.

setContourScalor

public void setContourScalor(boolean set,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.Integer type,
                             java.lang.Object[] objects)
Sets contour scalor visible or unvisible depending on the set parameter. If set is False, other parameters are not referenced.

Parameters:
set - True if contour scalor is wanted to be opened, False vice versa.
name - The name of values to be displayed.
type - The type of contour scalor.
objects - Array storing the objects to be displayed.
